messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: carpooling to hell anyone?
messages.msgSnippet: I haven t been accused of being on my way to hell yet, but I have been refered to as an aging hippie .  It s not the hippie part I mind so much, but well the
messages.messageBody:
I haven't been accused of being on my way to hell yet, but I have been refered to as an 'aging hippie'. It's not the hippie part I mind so much, but well the adjective aging... I just don't see it.:o)

Ann

camden <ccoutlaw@...> wrote:

> Of course my family/community thinks we are all going to hell and taking
> the kids with us!hehehe!
> Tricia

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Tricia,
Can we carpool ? ;) My MIL told me the same thing.......... "your all
going to hell, straight to hell & your taking those poor babies with you"

All because we've chosen to give our kids love & choices, not spankings &
tons of punishments :)

Carol
